**Government of Canada Tender Opportunity**
--------------------------------------

Fish Population Monitoring System at the Vianney-Legendre Fishway, Saint-Ours Canal National Historic Site

We are seeking a qualified contractor to design and install a fish population monitoring system at the Vianney-Legendre Fishway, Saint-Ours Canal National Historic Site.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The contractor will be responsible for designing and installing a fish population monitoring system that includes:

* Installing a fish counting system to monitor the movement of fish species
* Collecting data on the behavior and population of fish species
* Providing data to support conservation efforts under the Species at Risk Act (SARA)

**Delivery Schedule**
-------------------

The work under this contract will commence immediately upon signing of the contract and will be completed by March 31, 2023.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Bidders will be evaluated on their technical capability, experience, and price.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Submissions must include:

* A detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, methodology, and schedule
* A detailed price schedule
* Proof of qualifications and experience

**Accessing the Tender Package**
------------------------------

The tender package can be accessed through the Government of Canada's tendering service at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Caroline Demers at [caroline.demers@pc.gc.ca](mailto:caroline.demers@pc.gc.ca).
